mapper.select:
select ms.id, ms.message_type, ms.message_name, ms.message_text, ms.inputcode, ms.createdate, ms.modifydate, ms.note, ms.is_delete, ms.template_id, ms.params, ms.appid, msmt.type_name from md_shortmessage ms LEFT JOIN md_short_message_type msmt ON ms.message_type = msmt.id
ms.is_delete = 0 AND ms.id = #{id}
